title: First Look: The Ritchey SuperLogic VentureMax is a Tougher Flared Carbon Bar
content:
A more robust carbon VentureMax bar lands for the singletrack-curious gravel riders, with a 24Â° flare at the drops; available in four widths from 42-48cm, retailing at $299.95

Read the full article at First Look: The Ritchey SuperLogic VentureMax is a Tougher Flared Carbon Bar on Velo.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
